text:
The #COVID19 crisis is an unprecedented wake-up call.

We need to turn the recovery into a real opportunity to build a better future.

On this #EarthDay, join me in demanding a healthy and resilient future for people & planet. https://t.co/tVvTpiRrEf

entity.description: This entity covers all conversations for all years for Earth Day
